dedicatedCloud_datacenter_drp_subtitle: Build your Disaster Recovery Plan with Zerto
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_drp_details_EP: Protect your IT system by configuring your disaster recovery plan. Migrate your infrastructure in just 1 click, and in just a few minutes in the event of a malfunction or service interruption. Warning: you must have a secondary Private Cloud solution before enabling this option.
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_drp_warning: Your current datacenter does not have any hosts. Please order one to use this datacenter for your DRP, or select a datacenter with at least one host.
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_ovh_choice_EPC: Between two OVHcloud Private Cloud solutions
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_onPremise_choi: Between your infrastructure and an OVHcloud Private Cloud solution
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_drp_confirm_de: Deleting Zerto DRP. This will take a few minutes
